General.Name: Lamor Corporation Oyj
General.Description: Lamor Corporation Oyj develops, manufactures, sells, and leases oil spill response equipment. The company provides environmental protection and material recycling solutions. It also offers waste management and water treatment, environmental risk management, and hazardous and nonhazardous waste treatment services, as well as tailored and customized water purification solutions. The company serves oil and gas, and other industrial clients, as well as various other industries, including ports, and municipalities. The company operates in the Americas, Europe, Asia, the Middle East, and Africa. Lamor Corporation Oyj was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Porvoo, Finland.
